com.bigdata.ganglia

Interface IGangliaMetadataFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigdataMetadataFactory, DefaultMetadataFactory, GangliaMetadataFactory, NOPMetadataFactory

    public interface IGangliaMetadataFactory
    A factory for registering application metrics dynamically.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IGangliaMetadataMessage newDecl(String hostName, String metricName, Object value)
      Factory for new declarations.
      IGangliaMetadataMessage resolve(IGangliaMetadataMessage decl)
      Resolve a declaration received over the wire into a declaration with a richer object behavior.

    • Method Detail

      • newDecl

        IGangliaMetadataMessage newDecl(String hostName,
                              String metricName,
                              Object value)
        Factory for new declarations.
        Parameters:
        hostName - The name of this host.
        metricName - The ganglia metric name (suitably munged if necessary for use by ganglia).
        value - The metric value (NOT null).
        Returns:
        The metric declaration -or- null if this factory does not know how to declare this metric.

      • resolve

        IGangliaMetadataMessage resolve(IGangliaMetadataMessage decl)
        Resolve a declaration received over the wire into a declaration with a richer object behavior. This allows the application to substitute its own versions of an IGangliaMetadataMessage.
        Parameters:
        decl - A declaration (typically received over the wire).
        Returns:
        The declaration to be used.
